CustomField.formula:
If(isblank(X1_Budgetary_Proposal__c),"........................", "(1) " & If(len(text(Month(X1_Budgetary_Proposal__c))) = 1, "0" & text(Month( X1_Budgetary_Proposal__c)), text(Month( X1_Budgetary_Proposal__c))) & "/" & If (len(text(Day( X1_Budgetary_Proposal__c))) =1, "0" & text(Day( X1_Budgetary_Proposal__c)), text(Day( X1_Budgetary_Proposal__c))) & "/" & text(Year( X1_Budgetary_Proposal__c)))
&" " &
If(isblank(X2_LOI_Executed__c),"...................... ", "(2) " & IF(len(text(Month( X2_LOI_Executed__c))) = 1, "0" & text(Month( X2_LOI_Executed__c)), text(Month( X2_LOI_Executed__c))) & "/" & If (len(text(Day( X2_LOI_Executed__c))) =1, "0" & text(Day( X2_LOI_Executed__c)), text(Day( X2_LOI_Executed__c))) & "/" & text(Year( X2_LOI_Executed__c)))
CustomField.label: zzArchi(1) Budgetary .....(2) LOI Signed
